articles.title: Microsoft will sell you a $60 T-shirt with the Windows XP background - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft is launching a new “Hardwear” clothing collection. It includes a $60 T-shirt with the Windows XP background and an MS Paint-inspired tee.
